Configuration.Name: Conditional Notifications
Configuration.Author: Andrew Morgan
Configuration.Description: Sends conditional notification e-mails for requests in the Request Conditionalized queue.

Setting.name: EmailArticle
Setting.Description: Name of the conditional e-mail notification template for articles.

Setting.name: EmailLoan
Setting.Description: Name of the conditional e-mail notification template for loans.

Setting.name: Exclusions
Setting.Description: NVTGCs to exclude from Conditional Notifications. Enclose in single quotes, and separate multiple NVTGCs with commas. Example: 'ex1', 'ex2', 'ex3'
